Name: Post-EVA check
checklistText:
Post-EVA Final Subsystems Configuration

Purpose of Post-EVA Subsystems Configuration procedure 
is to verify/set LM controls after crewmen have 
returned LM to nominal in-flight status.

1.	Verify ECS Basic (Unstaged)
	Critical control positions are as follows:

ECS:
	SUIT GAS DIVERTER vlv - PUSH CABIN
	CABIN REPRESS vlv - AUTO 
	PRESS REG A vlv - CABIN 
	PRESS REG B vlv - CABIN 
	CABIN GAS RETURN vlv - AUTO 
	SUIT CIRCUIT RELIEF vlv - AUTO 
	Cabin relief & dump vlv (ovhd) - AUTO 
	Cabin relief & dump vlv (fwd) - AUTO

Panel 11:
	CB ECS: 
		CABIN FAN - open 
		SUIT FAN 1 - close

Panel 16:
	CB ECS: 
		CABIN REPRESS - close 
		SUIT FAN 2 - close 
		SUIT FAN Î”P - close 
		DIVERT VLV - close
2.	Verify EPS Basic (Unstaged)
3.	Verify Communicatuins Basic (not available in Reentry)

Panel 11:
4.	CB S/C: ATT DIR CONT - open

Panel 8:
5.	ED:
		MASTER ARM sw - OFF
		STAGE sw - SAFE

Panel 1:
6.	ENG THR CONT: ENG ARM sw - OFF

Panel 3:
7.	S/C: PGNS sw - OFF

Steps.Text: Verify ECS Basic (UNSTAGED): CLEAR ALL and run ECS BASIC (UNSTAGED)
Verify EPS Basic (UNSTAGED): CLEAR ALL and run ECS BASIC (UNSTAGED)
